name: Format\Logo
description: The component for including a logo image.

properties.name: URL
properties.description: The URL of an image file.

properties.name: accessibilityCaption
properties.description: A caption that describes the logo. Note that this property differs from caption: although the caption can be displayed to users, the accessibilityCaption is used by VoiceOver for iOS only. If accessibilityCaption is omitted, the caption value is used for VoiceOver for iOS.

properties.name: additions
properties.description: An array of ComponentLink objects. This can be used to create a ComponentLink, allowing a link to anywhere in News. Adding a link to a container component will make the entire component interactable. Any links used in its child components will no longer be interactable.

properties.name: caption
properties.description: A caption that describes the image. This text can be used by VoiceOver for iOS (compare accessibilityCaption).

properties.name: explicitContent
properties.description: Indicates that the image may contain explicit content.

properties.name: role
properties.description: This component always has a role of logo.
